contentBlocks.title: General Pool Pump Timer Requirements
paragraphs: Pool pump timers must be energy efficient and meet minimum efficiency requirements.
Pool pump timers must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Pool pump timers must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Pool pump timers must be suitable for the intended use of the pool.

contentBlocks.title: Energy Efficiency Requirements
paragraphs: Pool pump timers must meet minimum energy efficiency requirements as specified in the NCC.
Pool pump timers must be suitable for the intended use of the pool.
Pool pump timers must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Pool pump timers must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.

contentBlocks.title: Installation Requirements
paragraphs: Pool pump timers must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Pool pump timers must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Pool pump timers must be suitable for the intended use of the pool.
Pool pump timers must be installed by a qualified person.
